EmailTemplate.subject: Shell-Secured Credit Line Program Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good Afternoon{!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in our Shell Fuel Card Program!
I'm reaching out because you have been approved for our Secured Credit Line Program!
To start an account with us, please send in a deposit to secure the account along with the attached Deposit form. You may either mail the deposit to our bank or wire us the funds.
When the deposit is received your account will be set up and the deposit amount will be your line of credit.
After 6 months of using the account, we can send you that deposit back and extend a credit line for your company!
Reference Oppty Number: {!Siebel Oppty #}
Please reach out if you have any questions!
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
